channel.title: [PI]Sudden Salavation
channel.description:
Hi everyone!
This is mainly a client-sided release, but I'll give the source at the same. I wanted to make something that would stand out from all the InsidiaX leeches, but I don't know if it does, rly. >_<
Server features: - Everything that normal PI had - Gambling + Dice bag - Alot of items - Skillcape emotes - Custom storm of Armadyl with correct requirements (It's the Iban blast on spellbook, didn't get to add the correct sprite.) - Combat is all good - More, take a look if you want
Client features: - Project Insanity data (317 characters, 317 maps, 317 NPC's etc. etc. with 474 items.) - 602 animations & GFX - Alot of hardcoded items added - 562 Gameframe - Flawless switching - Alot of items (474 items + alot of hardcoded items, such as: Dragon defender, TokHaar-Kal, Armadyl staff and runes, New models for items such as Abyssal whip, Dragon scimitar, Dharok's greataxe and such.) - More, take a look if you want
Media:
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/kasl5k.png[/img] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/b8n5ld.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/35840pl.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/69dvua.png[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/svt5hj.png[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/1268x0o.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/v5v13n.png[/img]
Credits: Sanity DemonHorn (From Rune-Server) Anyone else who thinks he deserves.. PM me and I'll add. 0% To me.
Links: Client - http://uppit.com/d1q7e8n6lou3/Sudden_Salvation_-_Client.rar Source - http://uppit.com/vvvn9o2abdhx/Sudden_Salvation_-_Source.rar
Has no antileech in it, feel free to rip stuff from the client or source, I don't really care. If you will host this or use it as a base, I hope you give somekind of a credit to me.
If there is some random URLs for donating and such, ignore them, didn't get to do anything to those things.
Feel free to post anykind of feedback, negative or positive.
Thank you.

item.title: [PI]Sudden Salavation
item.dc:creator: @Dyl4n20 Dyl4n20
item.description:
@Dyl4n20 wrote:

[quote=“Ream, post:4, topic:465810”][quote author=xShrawenx link=topic=572321.msg4137964#msg4137964 date=1351873358]
Could you tell the others that this is my release…
For now it looks like you did the work even tho I worked my ass off to offer you this release.

Please, take some time to edit the topic and say it’s not made by you.
I never said that you can’t re-release this, but atleast tell them it’s made by ME.

If no-one believes this is my release, I can post a picture showing it’s mine on another RSPS community.

Regards,
-Demonhorn
[/quote]

Yes i said on the thread that its urs, I posted it on here becuase its a good release and people will rip off it.

Alot of people will actually use this and make a project out of it probs. I will use it and make it cleaner

100% Goes to this guy here ^^^^ Its his release. not mine![/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Sudden Salavation
item.dc:creator: @Ream Ream
item.description:
@Ream wrote:

Hi everyone!

This is mainly a client-sided release, but I’ll give the source at the same.
I wanted to make something that would stand out from all the InsidiaX leeches, but I don’t know if it does, rly. >_<

Server features:

  • Everything that normal PI had
  • Gambling + Dice bag
  • Alot of items
  • Skillcape emotes
  • Custom storm of Armadyl with correct requirements
    (It’s the Iban blast on spellbook, didn’t get to add the correct sprite.)
  • Combat is all good
  • More, take a look if you want

Client features:

  • Project Insanity data (317 characters, 317 maps, 317 NPC’s etc. etc. with 474 items.)
  • 602 animations & GFX
  • Alot of hardcoded items added
  • 562 Gameframe
  • Flawless switching
  • Alot of items (474 items + alot of hardcoded items, such as: Dragon defender, TokHaar-Kal, Armadyl staff and runes, New models for items such as Abyssal whip, Dragon scimitar, Dharok’s greataxe and such.)
  • More, take a look if you want

Media:




69dvua.png765×502

svt5hj.png766×502


Credits:
Sanity
DemonHorn (From Rune-Server)
Anyone else who thinks he deserves…
PM me and I’ll add.
0% To me.

Links:
Client - http://uppit.com/d1q7e8n6lou3/Sudden_Salvation_-Client.rar
Source - http://uppit.com/vvvn9o2abdhx/Sudden_Salvation-_Source.rar

Has no antileech in it, feel free to rip stuff from the client or source, I don’t really care. If you will host this or use it as a base, I hope you give somekind of a credit to me.

If there is some random URLs for donating and such, ignore them, didn’t get to do anything to those things.

Feel free to post anykind of feedback, negative or positive.

Thank you.
